first_name.description: The first name of the user.

last_name.description: The last name of the user.

email.description: A valid and unique email address.

country.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

phone.description: A valid phone number for the given country.

username.description: A valid and unique aplha_dash string.

password.description: The password to use for this account.

verify_phone.description: When set to true, a verification code will be sent to the phone after the account is created.

example.message: A verification code has been sent to +233553577261.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/register" 
    -d "first_name"="Victor" \
    -d "last_name"="Ariama" \
    -d "email"="user@gmail.com" \
    -d "country"="gh" \
    -d "phone"="+233553577261" \
    -d "username"="ovac4u" \
    -d "password"="qodehub123" \
    -d "password_confirmation"="qodehub123" \
    -d "verify_phone"="1"

post.description: This route can be used to check some fields on the fly during registration especially for unique fields.

requestBody.description: This route can be used to check some fields on the fly during registration especially for unique fields.

phone.description: A valid phone number for the given country.

country.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. `required when phone is present`

email.description: A valid and unique email address.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/register/validate" 
    -d "phone"="0553577261" \
    -d "country"="gh" \
    -d "email"="user@gmail.com"

post.description:
A login request will return a valid JWT token along with the user's object.
The token must be added as a HTTP header to all API calls that requires
authentication in the HTTP `Authorization` header like so:

`Authorization: Bearer <your token goes here>`

requestBody.description:
A login request will return a valid JWT token along with the user's object.
The token must be added as a HTTP header to all API calls that requires
authentication in the HTTP `Authorization` header like so:

`Authorization: Bearer <your token goes here>`

login.description: The user's registered email address or valid international phone number or username. Example: +233553577261. Example: user@gmail.com

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/login" 
    -d "login"="ovac4u" \
    -d "password"="qodehub123"

post.description: Refresh the api token of the currently authenticated user.

requestBody.description: Refresh the api token of the currently authenticated user.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/refresh" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user from using the bearer token.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/me" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

post.description: Invalidate the current authentication token and logout the user.

requestBody.description: Invalidate the current authentication token and logout the user.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/logout" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

post.description: Send a secret token to a user's email address to reset the user's password.

requestBody.description: Send a secret token to a user's email address to reset the user's password.

data.message: We have e-mailed your password reset link!

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/password/email" 
    -d "email"="user@gmail.com"

email.description: A valid and unique email address.

token.description: The secret token that was sent to the user's email.

password.description: The password to use for this account.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/password/reset" 
    -d "email"="user@gmail.com" \
    -d "token"="32c224ec96b1aca6d3e3b2985b72e93ca019497467256c8b7c76131ece7467fc" \
    -d "password"="qodehub456" \
    -d "password_confirmation"="qodehub456"
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/email/verify"

get.operationId: Mark the authenticated user's email address as verified.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/email/verify/{id}"
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/auth/email/resend"

get.description: Query for the list of verified phone number for the authenticated user.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/phones" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

post.description: Add and send verification code to a given phone number.

requestBody.description: Add and send verification code to a given phone number.

country.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

phone.description: A valid phone number for the given country.

example.message: A verification code has been sent to +233553577261.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/phones" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "country"="gh" \
    -d "phone"="+233553577261"

put.description: Verify a phone number with a code that was sent via text/SMS.

requestBody.description: Verify a phone number with a code that was sent via text/SMS.

country.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

phone.description: A valid phone number for the given country.

code.description: The verification code that was sent to the given phone number.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X PUT "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/phones" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "country"="gh" \
    -d "phone"="+233553577261" \
    -d "code"="1234"

get.description: Get a verified phone number by it's unique ID.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The ID of the phone number to retrieve.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/phones/{phone}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The ID of the phone number to remove.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X DELETE "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/phones/{phone}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

put.description: Set the given phone number ID as the default phone number.

requestBody.description: Set the given phone number ID as the default phone number.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The ID of the phone number to set as default.

example.message: +233553577262 has been set as your default phone number.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X PUT "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/phones/set-default/{phone}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

patch.description: Change the password on the authenticated user's account

requestBody.description: Change the password on the authenticated user's account

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X PATCH "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/settings/password" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "current_password"="secret" \
    -d "password"="P@$$word" \
    -d "password_confirmation"="P@$$word"

email.description: Updates the user's email address (must be unique).

username.description: Updates the user's username (must be unique).

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X PATCH "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/api/v1/settings/profile" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "first_name"="John" \
    -d "last_name"="Mahama" \
    -d "other_names"="Ibhrahim" \
    -d "email"="victorariama@qodehub.com" \
    -d "username"="ovac"
